messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

notification maintenance works for installation of amp on all servers time and time works hello please inform today about works scheduled weekend according attached further information please let thank best regards senior engineer

message.reasoning:

I'm currently processing the IT ticket to determine the most fitting category. The mention of "maintenance works for installation of amp on all servers" strongly suggests a hardware-related issue.

I'm focusing on classifying the IT ticket. The phrase "installation of amp on all servers" combined with "maintenance works" points towards classifying it under "Internal Project" due to the nature of system-wide deployment and planned upgrades.
